lead_paragraph: Representative Adam Schiff, the top Democrat on the House intelligence committee, called on Thursday for Attorney General Jeff Sessions to resign, saying he "clearly misled" the Senate about contacts with Russian officials.
snippet: Representative Adam Schiff, the top Democrat on the House intelligence committee, called on Thursday for Attorney General Jeff Sessions to resign, saying he "clearly misled" the Senate about contacts with Russian officials....

headline.main: Fun-Loving South African Golfer Hobday Dies at 76
